articles.author: Oren Liebermann
articles.title: US military releases footage of Russian fighter jet forcing down American drone over Black Sea - CNN
articles.description: US European Command released footage of the Tuesday encounter between a US surveillance drone and the Russian fighter jets as it played out over the Black Sea.
articles.content:
US European Command released footage of the Tuesday encounter between a US surveillance drone and the Russian fighter jets as it played out over the Black Sea.
